com.psddev.dari.db

Class WebDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.psddev.dari.db.AbstractDatabase<Void>
      • com.psddev.dari.db.WebDatabase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Database, SettingsBackedObject

    public class WebDatabase
extends AbstractDatabase<Void>
    Database backed by web APIs.
